title: 4chan Trolling UK Police

Overview
4chan Trolling UK Police refers to a raid on the United Kingdom police chats carried out by users of the /pol/ board of the
[4chan](/memes/sites/4chan) imageboard in August 2024 with the purpose of wasting their time and drawing resources away from the 2024 United Kingdom anti-immigration riots. The raid started on August 6th, 2024, and involved users contacting United Kingdom police with fake emergencies and crime reports.
